title: Bobbi Kristina's ex wants lawsuit dropped
text:
Does your future hold love or success? Find out daily from our star-sign expert. Bobbi Kristina's ex wants lawsuit dropped Wed, 07 Oct 2015 1:47 PM Share Your Email Bobbi Kristina Brown and Nick Gordon. Getty Images 
Nick Gordon claims that Bobbi Kristina Brown’s family's lawsuit against him will ultimately prevent him from receiving a "fair trial". 
According to TMZ , Gordon states in legal documents that his late ex-girlfriend’s family's death lawsuit which portrays him as a "murderer and scumbag" will prevent him from ever receiving a "fair trial" if prosecuted. 
According to the legal documents obtained by TMZ , Gordon alleges that the Brown family have portrayed him as a "murderer, a habitual batterer of women, a seducer of young white females, a thief and/or con man fueled by monetary gain and a chemist capable of making a toxic cocktail." 
According to TMZ , Gordon requests that the judge put an end to the Brown’s lawsuit against him. 
Gordon requests that the judge cease the $40-million suit "until the criminal process runs its course". 
The reasoning behind Gordon’s request, is that "the civil case would force him to answer questions that could be used against him" if he is ever charged. Staff Reporter
